decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01/08, 03/08, 02/08 and 04/08 Received: 24 November 2016,  05/08 Rev B Received: 16 January 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - Prior to first occupation of the development the redundant crossover as shown on the approved drawing shall be stopped up by raising the existing dropped kerb/removing the existing access and reinstating the footway and highway boundary to the same line, level and detail as the adjoining footway and highway boundary.

Condition : 5 - Prior to first occupation of the development hereby permitted the visibility splays at the vehicular access to the site shall be provided in accordance with the approved plans. The land within the splay areas shall be kept permanently clear of any obstruction to visibility greater than 600 mm high on land within the approved development site and the visibility splays shall be permanently retained as such thereafter.
description: Demolition of an existing garage and erection of a single storey side extension and formation of a vehicular access to the house
